feed.title: Track Awesome Wicket Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome projects powered by Apache Wicket

entry.title: Awesome Wicket Updates on Aug 24 - Aug 30, 2020
entry.content:
Web Frameworks / WicketStuff

  • Vuecket (⭐32) - Web Framework which integrates VueJS and Wicket and most natural way for both of them
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Aug 24 - Aug 30, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Wicket Updates on Jul 13 - Jul 19, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries

  • JNPM (⭐22) - Java library for JS Node Package Manager(NPM). Provides Wicket resource for transparent obtaining of NPM package and providing required file from it.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Jul 13 - Jul 19, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Wicket Updates on Dec 03 - Dec 09, 2018
entry.content:
Libraries

  • wicket-crudifier (⭐12) - Library to easily create CRUD's with wicket.
  • wicket-jersey (⭐4) - Adapter to run JAR-RX resources on Jersey2 under Wicket.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Dec 03 - Dec 09, 2018

entry.title: Awesome Wicket Updates on Jun 13 - Jun 19, 2016
entry.content:
Generic Info

  • Apache Wicket - Wicket official site.
  • Wicket on Github (⭐768) - Official mirror of Wicket on GitHub.
  • Wicket on Twitter - Official account of Wicket.
  • Wicket wiki - Official knowledge base on Wiki about Wicket.
  • Build With Wicket - Official Tumblr account of Wicket.
  • Wicket User Guide - Wicket user guide for version 7.x.
  • Wicket JavaDocs - Wicket JavaDocs for version 7.x.
  • Wicket in Action - Blog and book about Wicket.

IDE Plugins and Tools / WicketStuff

  • qwickie - Eclipse plugin for the Java Webframework Wicket
  • WicketForge (⭐37) - IDE plugin for IntelliJ IDEA designed to assist developers creating applications using Apache Wicket.
entry.summary: 10 awesome projects updated on Jun 13 - Jun 19, 2016

entry.title: Awesome Wicket Updates on Apr 25 - May 01, 2016
entry.content:
Libraries

  • wicket-akka (⭐3) - Integration of Akka for Wicket.
  • wicket-autowire (⭐11) - Makes your life easier by automatic creation of component according to provided annotation.
  • wicket-bootstrap (⭐300) - Integration of Bootstrap Toolkit for Wicket.
  • wicket-clientside-logging (⭐16) - Helper library that allows javascript logging on client side, all log messages will be stored on server side too.
  • wicket-console (⭐9) - Lightweight AJAX-enabled web console for runtime execution JS scripts on server side.
  • wicket-dnd (⭐20) - Generic Drag&Drop framework for Wicket.
  • wicket-extjs-integration (⭐1) - Integration of Wicket with ExtJS with event handling and a focus on making the Java-API as close to the JS-API as possible.
  • wicket-fullcalendar (⭐24) - Integration of FullCalendar javascript lib with Wicket.
  • wicket-jquery-selectors (⭐16) - Library for working with JQuery and Wicket.
  • wicket-jquery-ui - JQuery UI integration in Wicket 1.5.x, Wicket 6.x & Wicket7.x.
  • wicket-mustache (⭐6) - Provides a specialized panel and some related utilities that enables users to work with Mustache and Wicket.
  • wicket-orientdb (⭐33) - Integration of Wicket with OrientDB.
  • wicket-requirejs (⭐8) - Helper to use require.js in your Wicket application.
  • wicket-shieldui (⭐23) - Components leveraging the use of the Shield UI JavaScript library.
  • wicket-source (⭐37) - Speeds up Wicket development by providing click-through from browser HTML back to the original Wicket components in your source.
  • wicket-spring-boot (⭐153) - Makes it easy to create Wicket projects with a minimum of configuration effort by using Sprint Boot.
  • wicket-webjars (⭐34) - Integration of webjars for Wicket.
  • wicked-charts (⭐91) - Beautiful and interactive javascript charts for Java-based web applications.

Libraries / WicketStuff

  • Annotation (⭐346) - Mount your pages declarativly by java annotations.
  • Annotation Event Dispatcher (⭐346) - Improves events handling in Wicket by annotations.
  • Async Tasks (⭐346) - Control a background process within a Wicket application.
  • Console (⭐346) - Provides support for executing code dynamically (at runtime).
  • Context (⭐346) - Used to locate components,models and models' objects declaratively with @Context annotation.
  • Dashboard (⭐346) - Support of dashboards for Wicket for quick access to required information in widgets.
  • DataStores (⭐346) - Collection of various implementation of IDataStore (⭐768): MemCached, Apache Cassandra, Redis, Hazelcast.
  • Datatable Autocomplete (⭐346) - Provides a search data structure known as a Trie that allows AJAX searches on large datasets fast.
  • Editable Grid (⭐346) - A grid component with add/edit/delete feature all at once, apart from supporting sorting/filtering/paging.
  • Facebook (⭐346) - Contains wicket components and behaviors to use the Facebook social plugins with wicket.
  • GMap3 (⭐346) - Offers a component to use Google Maps v3 within Wicket applications.
  • Google AppEngine Initializer (⭐346) - Provides Wicket's org.apache.wicket.IInitializer implementation that auto-configures the Wicket Application to be runable at Google AppEngine.
  • Google Charts (⭐346) - Allows creation of charts using the Google Chart API.
  • HTML5 (⭐346) - Contains classes that give wicket support for using exciting new Html5 features.
  • HTML Compressor (⭐346) - Integration library for Wicket and htmlcompressor.
  • InMethodGrid (⭐346) - Data grid component.
  • Java EE Inject (⭐346) - Provides integration through Java EE 5 resource injection.
  • JEE Web Integration (⭐346) - Embed Servlet, JSP abd JSF content into wicked HTML pages.
  • JqPlot Plugin Integration (⭐346) - Produces beautiful line, bar and pie charts with many features.
  • JWicket UI Toolip (⭐346) - Generate the JavaScript needed to provide a Wicket Component with a jQuery UI tooltip.
  • Kryo Serializer (⭐346) - An implementation of org.apache.wicket.serialize.ISerializer for Wicket.
  • Kryo2 Serializer (⭐346) - An implementation of org.apache.wicket.serialize.ISerializer for Wicket.
  • LazyModel (⭐346) - Type-safe model implementation.
  • Lightbox2 Plugin Integration (⭐346) - Simple, unobtrusive script used to overlay images on top of the current page.
  • Logback (⭐346) - The home for classes that can help with using wicket and logback together.
  • Minis (⭐346) - Collection of assorted components and behaviors that are too small to warrant their own project.
  • ModalX (⭐346) - A lightweight extension to Wicket's ModalWindow capabilities that comes with standardized MessageBox class and allows easy definition of Modal dialog box classes.
  • OSGI (⭐346) - Lets you use Wicket in OSGi environments.
  • Open Layers 3 (⭐346) - Provides a set of components that may be used to add interactive maps to a Wicket application.
  • POI (⭐346) - Integrates Wicket projects to Apache POI.
  • Progressbar (⭐346) - Provides a progress bar component for Wicket.
  • Push (⭐346) - Provides support for Reverse AJAX in Wicket applications and allows them to "push" partial Web page updates to the Web browser.
  • Scala Extensions (⭐346) - Improves the syntax of Wicket models when using the Scala programming language.
  • Select2 (⭐346) - Provides Apache Wicket components that leverage Select2 JavaScript library to build select boxes that provide Ajax choice filtering, custom rendering and etc.
  • Servlet Container Authentication and Authorization (⭐346) - Simplify the integration of wicket-auth-roles with the servlet 3 security container.
  • Spring Reference (⭐346) - Can be used to integrate a wicket web application with spring.
  • Stateless (⭐346) - Adds a few components that provide more comprehensive stateless features for Wicket.
  • TinyMCE Integration (⭐346) - Integration of the well-known TinyMCE WYSIWYG editor in Wicket.
  • Twitter (⭐346) - Contains wicket components and behaviors to use the Twitter widgets with wicket.
  • UrlFragment (⭐346) - With this you can build bookmarkable AJAX features and still support the back button.
  • WHighCharts (⭐11) - Provides WiQuery bindings for HighCharts.
  • Whiteboard (⭐346) - Provides a Whiteboard which can be integrated in any wicket application.
  • wicket-foundation (⭐346) - Integrates Wicket and Zurb Foundation.
  • Wicket Rest Annotations (⭐346) - Provides a special resource class and a set of annotations to implement REST API/services in much the same way as we do it with Spring MVC or with the standard JAX-RS.
  • WqPlot (⭐9) - Provides WiQuery bindings for JqPlot.

Web Frameworks / WicketStuff

  • Apache Isis - A framework for rapidly developing domain-driven apps in Java.
  • BrixCMS - Wicket based CMS (seems to be dead).
  • Hippo CMS - Enables enterprises to continuously refine their online business strategy by responding quickly to content performance metrics.
  • NoWicket - A naked objects framework for Wicket that enables developers to write less boilerplate Wicket code during implementation of complex websites.

Solutions / WicketStuff

  • Orienteer (⭐255) - Open source Business Application Platform for implementation of data warehouse, CRM, ERP, app/site backend system and other business apps.
  • eFaps - A list od modules and applications that together form the base of a configurable ERP implementation.
  • eHour - Open source time tracking tool.
  • Estatio (⭐202) - Open source estate management built on Apache Isis and wicket.
  • GeoServer (⭐4.1k) - Open source software server written in Java that allows users to share and edit geospatial data.
  • NextReports - Smart business reportins.
  • ProjectForge - Open source software for your project management.
  • Yes Cart (⭐111) - Pure e-Commerse platform.
entry.summary: 75 awesome projects updated on Apr 25 - May 01, 2016

entry.title: Awesome Wicket Updates on Apr 18 - Apr 24, 2016
entry.content:
Libraries

  • wicket-modelfactory - Wicket-modelfactory is an API to create Wicket PropertyModels in a typesafe and refactoring-safe way.

Libraries / WicketStuff

  • Autocomplete TagIt (⭐346) - TagIt integration with Wicket.
  • BrowserId (⭐346) - Mozilla Persona integration with Wicket.
  • DataTables (⭐346) - DataTables jQuery Plugin Integration.
  • Eidogo (⭐346) - SGF viewer and editor for GO game (also called baduk, igo or weiqi).
  • Fast Serializer (⭐346) - Wicket Serializer using the Fast 1.x (FST) library.
  • Fast Serializer 2 (⭐346) - Wicket Serializer using the Fast 2.x (FST) library.
  • MBeanView (⭐346) - JMX panel, to view and operate the applications mbeans.
  • WiQuery (⭐8) - Wicket integration with jQuery and jQuery UI.

Web Frameworks / WicketStuff

  • Nocket (⭐9) - Naked Object based framework for wicket.
  • Wicketopia (⭐18) - Rapid Application Development (RAD) library for the Wicket.
entry.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Apr 18 - Apr 24, 2016
